dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eridoria, where magic and technology coexist in a world of wonder.

dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: I've heard rumors of a powerful artifact hidden deep within the nearby forest. I must find it before it falls into the wrong hands.

dialogue.speaker: Arin the Bold
dialogue.text: Eira, I'm with you on this quest. But we should be careful - the forest is full of dark creatures and treacherous terrain.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: As they venture into the forest, they come across a clearing with a large stone pedestal in the center. On top of the pedestal lies the artifact - a glowing crystal orb.
